name: Fly Speed
description: A Fly Speed can be used to travel through the air. While you have a Fly Speed, you can stay aloft until you land, fall, or die. See also "Flying" and "Speed."

sourceRef.file: docs/sources/phb2024/rules-glossary/13-Rules Glossary - Player's Handbook - Dungeons & Dragons - Sources - D&D Beyond.pdf
